en_text: Now do you see the might of our Red Ribbon army?
jp_text:
我がレッドリボン軍の
威力を見たか｡
google_translated:
My Red Ribbon Army
I saw the power.

en_text: Okay! All units, storm the village!\NSearch for the Dragon Ball!
jp_text: ドラゴンボールを探し出せ！

en_text: I did it! I found it!
jp_text: やったー！ 見つけたぞ！

en_text: Pilaf-sama! Hurry! Hurry!
jp_text: ピラフ様！ 早く早く！

en_text: Don't let him get away!
jp_text:
逃がすな！
(銃声)

en_text: So when you call out with "Oi," I'll answer with "Hai"...
jp_text: オラが｢は～い｣なんて答えて…｡➡

en_text: Ouch! You really hurt!
jp_text: 痛えな お前は！

en_text: Huh? What's that?
jp_text: あれ？ あれ何だ？

en_text: T-That's...!
jp_text: あ… あれは！

en_text: Okay, hurry and get on!
jp_text: さっ 早く お前も乗れ！

en_text: Goku is unaware that Pilaf has stolen the Dragon Ball and run off.
jp_text:
ドラゴンボールは ピラフが奪って
逃げてしまった｡➡
google_translated:
Dragon Ball takes pilaf
I ran away.

en_text: Nor does he know of the mysterious army that's also after it... Red Ribbon.
jp_text:
そして それを追う
謎の軍団 レッドリボン｡➡
google_translated:
And chase it
Mysterious Corps Red Ribbon.

en_text: Will Goku be able to catch up with them?!
jp_text:
悟空は 追いつくことが
できるのであろうか｡〉
google_translated:
Goku catches up
Can you do it?>

en_text: Go on and try to live even more wild and strong!
jp_text: ピラフのメカと 大空中戦！
google_translated: Pilaf's mechanical and large sky battle!

en_text: If you will show me your true courage
jp_text: ♬ 君の若さ 隠さないで

en_text: I'll give your pounding heart a glittery, shining dream!
jp_text: 絶対 見てくれよな！
google_translated: I will definitely look at it!
